entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
